summary: All source files for the Lakeview Manor Evolution mod
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]These are all of the original source files for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55154/?]Lakeview Manor Evolution[/url] mod.

Some of the included resources are:

[list]
[*]All of the modular architectural meshes that I used to reconstruct the manor
[*]Numerous custom furniture meshes
[*]The [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aVl4D6Ar0ms]unique ingredient display system[/url]
[*]Numerous other custom displays for unique items
[*]Numerous unique clutter items
[*]A tonne of other things that I'm too lazy to mention, there are around 600 custom meshes included
[*]There will also be some meshes which were still a work in progress or experimental so these won't appear in the original mod but I've kept the files in this resource pack anyway
[/list]
[/size]Feel free to use any/all of the resources it contains for your own projects.

You can also use the included .esp file as the starting point for creating your own Lakeview Manor mod.  Feel free to modify, remove, extend or fix anything that I have done in the original Lakeview Manor Evolution mod to create your ideal Skyrim home.

Note: The .esp file is in an [i]unclean[/i] state to make it easy to edit to interior of the manor.  Otherwise it's virtually impossible to work on the interior if all the original items are still visible. This means that you should go through the mod cleaning process before uploading your own creation to Nexus.

All that I ask is that you drop me a credit if you do use these resources. You should also include credits for the other modders resources I've used to create Lakeview Manor Evolution.  You can find the list on the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55154/?]Lakeview Manor Evolution[/url] mod page.

Also, if you do upload your own modified Lakeview Manor based on the included .esp file please let me know via a PM and I will add a link to it here and on the Lakeview Manor Evolution mod page.
author: mrpdean
